item.title: Error Analysis of Spherically Constrained Least Squares Reformulation in Solving the Stackelberg Prediction Game
item.description: This research paper presents a novel theoretical error analysis for the spherically constrained least squares (SCLS) method used to solve Stackelberg prediction games (SPGs). SPGs model strategic int…
